Package com.cm.projects.spring.resource.chasis.utils

Class LoggerService

java.lang.Object
com.cm.projects.spring.resource.chasis.utils.LoggerService
public abstract class LoggerService
extends java.lang.Object
Used to handle logging requests and checking if maker is performing current requests
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cornelius M

  • Method Details

    • log

      public abstract void log​(java.lang.String description, java.lang.String entity, java.lang.Object entityId, java.lang.String activity, java.lang.Short activityStatus, java.lang.String notes)
      Used to handle the logging request
      Parameters:
      description - action description
      entity - entity/model being affected e.g. User
      entityId - entity ID i.e. value of the field annotated with Id
      activity - activity being performed e.g. update, deletion, creation or deactivation
      activityStatus - activity status id e.g. AppConstants.STATUS_ID_ACTIVE
      notes - more information describing the action

    • isInitiator

      public abstract boolean isInitiator​(java.lang.String Entity, java.lang.Object entityId, java.lang.Short statusId)
      Used to check if the current user initiated the current action.
      Parameters:
      Entity - entity being affected e.g. User
      entityId - entity ID i.e. value of the field annotated with Id
      statusId - status id
      Returns:
      {@link true} if the current user is the initiator

    • logAuthentication

      public void logAuthentication​(java.lang.String description, java.lang.String entity, java.lang.Object entityId, java.lang.Short activityStatus)
      Log authentication with activity ACTIVITY_AUTHENTICATION
      Parameters:
      description - action description
      entity - entity/model being affected
      entityId - entity ID i.e. value of the field annotated with Id
      activityStatus - activity status id e.g. AppConstants.STATUS_ID_ACTIVE

    • logCreate

      public void logCreate​(java.lang.String description, java.lang.String entity, java.lang.Object entityId, java.lang.Short activityStatus)
      Used to handle audit log with activity type create
      Parameters:
      description - action description
      entity - entity/model being affected
      entityId - entityId entity ID i.e. value of the field annotated with Id
      activityStatus - activity status id e.g. AppConstants.STATUS_ID_ACTIVE
